item.description: NERAX is this week (March 20th-23rd). It's the New England Real Ale eXhibition (www.NERAX.org) with over 110 firkins of cask beer (and a few ciders, too). This spring festival is all about session beers - great taste without extreme alcohol (typically). We could hit opening night (Wednesday) to get the first beers put on; or since they put new beers on every day and lots will still be pouring Saturday evening, we could go to the Saturday evening session from 5pm-9pm which is only $10 in advance ($12 at the door).
item.name: Drink Real Ale at NERAX
